name: Aceternity UI
description: A set of svg paths that animate in a wave pattern. Good for hero sections background, as seen on height.app

props.Description: The content to be rendered inside the component.
Additional CSS classes to be applied to the outer container.
Options for customizing the SVG animation.
Options for customizing the SVG animation. Properties: -duration: number - The duration of each path animation in seconds.

usage_notes: A set of svg paths that animate in a wave pattern. Good for hero sections background, as seen on height.app
